title: 1: Episode 1
itunes:title: Episode 1
description:
• This week: Discussing HBP
  • Top News: New GOF Pictures, GOF release dates
  • Andrew thinks this movie will be one of the best
  • Kevin says this one will be better for the Harry Potter fans
  • Yet Ben thinks WB focuses the appeal on the general public, rather than the fans
  • Discussion of PG/PG-13 rating
  • Do younger kids read the series?
  • GOF release dates
  • July 16th = huge success
  • JKR is using HBP to setup HP7 perfectly
  • Harry will return to Hogwarts… but not for normal reasons
  • Misprinted copies are bound to happen
  • Horcruxes…what are they?
  • So who IS R.A.B? We discuss clues and different options
  • Relationships in HBP
  • Ben has an excellent Shakespeare-like mind
  • We highlight [Deceased Character]isnotdead.com and discuss that character’s future effects on the book
  • Is Snape evil or is he really on the good side?
  • Portraits: how well can you communicate with them?
  • Discussion of book seven
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
